name: Dice'tinee
description:
Did you know gods love games?
I saw them gable over a dice game.
They bet a bottle.
Everything you know and everything you love is inside this bottle.
You most retrive this bottle or you shall never see what you know and what you love again.

We developed "Dice'tinee" for the 2022 GMTK game jam. Unfortunatly, we did not have time to finish the game.

Dice'tinee is a roguelike where you go around the place clearing monster to collect their god given dice. You can then use them as upgrade for your stats, your HP or has currency in the shop with them and hope the dice give you high numbers.

Team menbers

 Poutinator - Code

Yeti - Concept art, environment textures, UI, 2D art

Hypogamer - 3D art, characters textures
